reporter_caption.center: THOMAS F. LOGAN et al. v. ROBERT J. DELLATORE et al.

opinion.posture: Motion of defendants for extension of time for filing briefs is denied. Motion of plaintiffs to dismiss the appeal is granted.
opinion.attorneys:
Strauss, Factor, Chernick Hillman, P.C., Stephen B. Lang, for plaintiffs.
Howard K. Simmons, for defendants.
